message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/Linguistic_Linked_Data:_Introductory_References 

This aims to be a short list of links and references useful for those who are new to the Semantic Web and Linguistic Linked Data (LLD). Many of these references are extracted from the material of introductory courses at the Facultad de Informática (
Introduction to Ontologies
,
Semantic Web and Linked Data
,
Sistemas Inteligentes
, etc.).

Linguistic Linked Data

Key References

lemon - The Lexicon Model for Ontologies
Linguistic Linked Open Data Cloud
The Lemon Cookbook
Montiel-Ponsoda, Elena, et al. "Representing translations on the semantic web." (2011).
Buitelaar, Paul, et al. "Ontology lexicalisation: The lemon perspective." (2011).
Cimiano, Philipp, et al. "LexInfo: A declarative model for the lexicon-ontology interface." Web Semantics: Science, Services and Agents on the World Wide Web 9.1 (2011): 29-51.
McCrae, John, et al. "Interchanging lexical resources on the Semantic Web." Language Resources and Evaluation 46.4 (2012): 701-719.
Chiarcos, Christian, et al. "Towards open data for linguistics: Linguistic linked data." New Trends of Research in Ontologies and Lexical Resources. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2013. 7-25.
Further Reading

Vertan, Cristina. "Language resources for the Semantic Web: perspectives for machine translation." Proceedings of the Second International Workshop on Language Resources for Translation Work, Research and Training. Association for Computational Linguistics, 2004.
Francopoulo, Gil, et al. "Lexical markup framework (LMF)." International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation-LREC 2006. 2006.
Espinoza, Mauricio, Asunción Gómez-Pérez, and Eduardo Mena. Enriching an ontology with multilingual information. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2008.
Navigli, Roberto, and Simone Paolo Ponzetto. "BabelNet: The automatic construction, evaluation and application of a wide-coverage multilingual semantic network." Artificial Intelligence 193 (2012): 217-250.
Windhouwer, Menzo, and Sue Ellen Wright. "Linking to linguistic data categories in ISOcat." Linked Data in Linguistics. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2012. 99-107.
[Book] Chiarcos, Christian, Sebastian Nordhoff, and Sebastian Hellmann. Linked Data in Linguistics. Heidelberg: Springer, 2012.
Chiarcos, Christian, and Maria Sukhareva. "OLiA–Ontologies of Linguistic Annotation." Semantic Web (2013).
de Melo, Gerard. "Lexvo. org: Language-related information for the linguistic linked data cloud." Semantic Web (2013): 7.
McCrae, John Philip, and Philipp Cimiano. "Mining translations from the web of open linked data." Joint Workshop on NLP&LOD and SWAIE: Semantic Web, Linked Open Data and Information Extraction. 2013.
Hellmann, Sebastian, et al. "Integrating nlp using linked data." The Semantic Web–ISWC 2013. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2013. 98-113.
Gracia, Jorge, et al. "Enabling Language Resources to Expose Translations as Linked Data on the Web." 9th International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation, LREC. Vol. 14.
Proceedings of the 3rd Workshop on Linked Data in Linguistics
Lewis, David, et al. "Global Intelligent Content: Active Curation of Language Resources using Linked Data."
[Apertium project, Draft]: Gracia, J. Guidelines for Linguistic Linked Data Generation: Bilingual Dictionaries:
http://bpmlod.github.io/report/bilingual-dictionaries/index.html
Gracia, J., Montiel-ponsoda, E., Vila-suero, D., & Aguado-de-cea, G. (n.d.). Enabling Language Resources to Expose Translations as Linked Data on the Web.
Unger, Christina, André Freitas, and Philipp Cimiano. "An Introduction to Question Answering over Linked Data." Reasoning Web. Reasoning on the Web in the Big Data Era. Springer International Publishing, 2014. 100-140.

Ontology Engineering

Introductory Readings

Gómez-Pérez, A., Fernández-López, M., & Corcho, O. (2004). Ontological Engineering: with Examples from the Areas of knowledge Management, e-Commerce and Semantic Web. Springer.
Gruber, T. (1993). A translation approach to portable ontology specifications. Knowledge Acquisition, 5(April), 199–220.
Roussey, C., Pinet, F., Kang, M., & Corcho, O. (2011). An Introduction to Ontologies and Ontology Engineering.
Lassila, O., & McGuinness, D. L. (2001). The Role of Frame-Based Representation on the Semantic Web. Review of Accounting Studies, 12, 369.
Building Ontologies

The NeOn Book
The NeOn Glossary of Terms
